Package Maze

Class MazeEditor

java.lang.Object
Maze.MazeEditor
All Implemented Interfaces:
ActionListener, EventListener
public class MazeEditor extends Object implements ActionListener
This is a class for the maze editor which the user interacts with, its properties are made up of individual private GUI elements which are used to get user input, The current maze being editted is also held in a Maze field named currentMaze

    Used to create a popup error message for any exception thrown

    This method exports a maze with a name and author attached to it, these are obtained from the user inputs in authorTextArea and nameTextArea JTextArea's

  • Method Details

    • createGUI

      public void createGUI() throws Exception
      This method creates the GUI user and sets it to visible. From here the user can interact with the buttons and text boxes and use them as inputs. The current maze property is also instantiated here so that there is a preloaded maze for the user of size 70x50
      Throws:
      Exception

    • actionPerformed

      public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent e)
      This actionlistener picks up whenever an action is performed and uses a switch statement to check what specific component has been interacted with and then performs a gui function based on the component's purpose
      Specified by:
      actionPerformed in interface ActionListener

    • generateMaze

      public void generateMaze() throws Exception
      This method generates a randomized maze which size is dependent on the users inputs in the sizeTextBoxX and sizeTextBoxY JTextArea's
      Throws:
      Exception

    • editMode

      public void editMode() throws Exception
      This methods opens a window which then allows the user to interact and create their own maze with a paint canvas
      Throws:
      Exception

    • exportMaze

      public void exportMaze() throws SQLException, Exception
      This method exports a maze with a name and author attached to it, these are obtained from the user inputs in authorTextArea and nameTextArea JTextArea's
      Throws:
      SQLException
      Exception

    • getDatabaseResults

      public JPanel getDatabaseResults() throws SQLException, IOException, ClassNotFoundException
      Throws:
      SQLException
      IOException
      ClassNotFoundException

    • showSolution

      public void showSolution()
      This method is run whenever the solutionCheckBox is true and creates a visible solution for the maze currently displayed

    • errorMessage

      public void errorMessage(String message)
      Used to create a popup error message for any exception thrown
      Parameters:
      message - is a String that describes the response to relay to the user via a popup window
